active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Enable Google Tag Manager Enhanced Ecommerce (UA) Tracking

code_head.label: Google Tag Manager Code (Head)
code_head.comment: Inserts Google Tag Manager Head snippet. It will be inserted directly in <head>

code_body.label: Google Tag Manager Code (Body)
code_body.comment: Inserts Google Tag Manager Body snippet. It will be inserted right after <body> opening tag

refund.label: UA Tracking ID
refund.comment: Google Analytics Tracking ID (UA ID) for measuring refunds

conversion_color.label: Conversion Color
conversion_color.comment: Hex value e.g 666666. Do not include # prefix

tax.label: Tax
tax.comment: Choose whether Tax (e.g VAT) should be calculated in revenue

shipping.label: Shipping
shipping.comment: Choose whether shipping amount should be calculated in revenue

enable.label: Enable pixel tracking
enable.comment: The Facebook pixel is an analytics tool that allows you to measure the effectiveness of your advertising by understanding the actions people take on your website.

addPixelId.label: Facebook Pixel ID
addPixelId.comment: Insert your Facebook Pixel ID. You can obtain the pixel ID from Events manager -> Pixels -> Pixel ID

enable_advanced_matching.label: Enable advanced matching
enable_advanced_matching.comment:
This new feature of the Facebook pixel enables advertisers to leverage their own customer data such as email address, phone number, and so on.
Learn more

google_gtm_ua.label: Universal Analytics Tracking ID
google_gtm_ua.comment: ex.: UA-000000-01. Tracking ID can be obtained in your Google Analytics account under Admin -> Tracking info -> Tracking code

google_gtm_account_id.label: Account ID
google_gtm_account_id.comment: Google Tag Manager Account ID ex.: 19671043. Account ID can be obtained in your GTM account under Admin -> Account settings

google_adwords_conversion_id.label: Adwords Conversion ID
google_adwords_conversion_id.comment: Used for creating/configuring dynamic remarketing tag(s)

google_adwords_conversion_label.label: Adwords Conversion Label
google_adwords_conversion_label.comment: Used for creating/configuring dynamic remarketing tag(s)

use_measurement_protocol.label: Track offline orders
use_measurement_protocol.comment: If enabled, the extension will track admin orders using Google Analytics Measurement Protocol

use_measurement_protocol_cancel.label: Track cancelled orders
use_measurement_protocol_cancel.comment: If enabled, the extension will a reverse transaction to Google Analytics. A reverse transaction contains negative values for revenue, price etc.

cart.label: Add to Cart selector
cart.comment: Query to find "Add to cart" button/link

cart_delete.label: Remove from Cart selector
cart_delete.comment: Query to find "Remove from cart" button/link

click.label: Impression click selector
click.comment: Query selector to find product image and/or detail link. Path should be relative to Impression list selector

click_ajax.label: Add to cart category selector
click_ajax.comment: Query selector to find direct "Add to cart" button in categories. Path should be relative to Impression list selector

click_ajax_wishlist.label: Add to cart from wishlist selector
click_ajax_wishlist.comment: Query selector to find direct "Add to cart" button in Wishlist

wishlist.label: Add to wishlist selector
wishlist.comment: Query selector to find direct "Add to wishlist" link on product detail page

wishlist_category.label: Add to wishlist selector (categories)
wishlist_category.comment: Query selector to find direct "Add to wishlist" link on category product

compare.label: Add to compare selector
compare.comment: Query selector to find direct "Add to compare" link on product detail page

compare_category.label: Add to compare selector (categories)
compare_category.comment: Query selector to find direct "Add to compare" link on category product

beta.label: Beta features
beta.comment: Activates beta features. Leave this disabled unless instructed otherwise.

beta_placeholders.label: Pre-processing strip
beta_placeholders.comment: If enabled, the module will strip any script tags prior to processing templates. Enable ONLY if you experience rendering issues and/or see any JS code rendered in your pages

behaviour.label: Experiment behaviour
behaviour.comment: Replacing original content may have impact on search engines rakings and indexation.

use_category_segments.label: Send categories as segments
use_category_segments.comment: Sends product category and it's parents as slash separated string.

use_custom_option_field.label: Custom option variant field
use_custom_option_field.comment: Select what field to use for constructing variant property for products with custom options. Defaults to SKU

use_child.label: Send child SKU
use_child.comment: Forces module to send child product SKU for configurable products. By default the module will send the configurable SKU and push the selected options as variant in dataLayer[] object.

use_viewport.label: Smart viewport
use_viewport.comment: Determines visible items in categories and sends impression data based on items within browser fold e.g. visible items only.

tax.label: Tax
tax.comment: Push prices in dataLayer[] incl/excl. tax

eventTimeout.label: eventTimeout in ms.
eventTimeout.comment: Timeout to use for triggering default actions in Private mode. Value in milliseconds e.g. enter 2000 for 2 seconds timeout.

dynx.label: Enable dynx_ support
dynx.comment: Adds dynx_* parameters to support Other site types

content_background_color.label: Background color
content_background_color.comment: Choose background color. Default: rgb(255,255,255) e.g. White

content_text_color.label: Text color
content_text_color.comment: Choose text color. Default: rgb(0,0,0) e.g. Black

content_accept_color.label: Accept link color
content_accept_color.comment: Choose accept link color. Default: rgb(0,0,0) e.g. Black

content_link_learn.label: Learn more link
content_link_learn.comment: Modifies learn more link URL address

parameter.label: Affiliate parameter
parameter.comment: Unique parameter to check for in URL. If request URL contains this parameter, the whole session will be correlated to it. This includes pageviews, orders, events etc.

dimension.label: Affiliate custom dimension index
dimension.comment: Defaults to 20 e.g. dimension[20]. This is a product scoped dimension so it requires specific dimension index. Index can be obtained from Google Analytics
